primary_program: blood and marrow transplant and cellular immunotherapy
overview: Dr. Bejanyan's research interests are improved stem cell transplantation for myeloid malignancies, including strategies for relapse prevention, improvement of conditioning regimens and immune reconstitution. She is also interested in improved outcomes associated with alternative donor transplantation for patients with hematologic malignancies.
research_interests:
Dr. Bejanyan's research interests are improved stem cell transplantation for myeloid malignancies, including strategies for relapse prevention, improvement of conditioning regimens and immune reconstitution. She is also interested in improved outcomes associated with alternative donor transplantation for patients with hematologic malignancies.
